_comment: Server rules configuration - easily edit rule text here
_instructions: Edit the text for each rule. Keep rule numbers 1-10.

1.title: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Be Respectful
1.text: Treat everyone respectfully. Disrespectful or toxic behavior will result in action.

2.title: 2Ô∏è‚É£ 18+ Only
2.text: PA is for adults only. You must be 18 or older to participate.

3.title: 3Ô∏è‚É£ Be Civil & Read the Room
3.text: Avoid sensitive topics unless everyone is comfortable. No such discussions in text channels.

4.title: 4Ô∏è‚É£ NSFW Content Is Not Allowed
4.text: Explicit, grotesque, or pornographic content will result in a ban.

5.title: 5Ô∏è‚É£ Communication - English Preferred
5.text: Please speak in English so the whole community can engage.

6.title: 6Ô∏è‚É£ Use Channels & Roles Properly
6.text:
Use the correct channels for each topic.
üìå [Roles How-To](https://wiki.parentsthatga.me/discord/roles)
üìå [LFG Guide](https://wiki.parentsthatga.me/discord/lfg)

7.title: 7Ô∏è‚É£ Promoting Your Own Content
7.text: Promote in #promote-yourself or #clip-sharing only. Apply in #applications to post on official PA platforms.

8.title: 8Ô∏è‚É£ Crowdfunding & Solicitation
8.text: No donation or solicitation links allowed. DM spam is not tolerated.

9.title: 9Ô∏è‚É£ No Unapproved Invites or Links
9.text:
Game server links require vetting and Discord invites are absolutely not allowed.
üìå [Host/Advertise](https://wiki.parentsthatga.me/servers/hosting)
üìå [Apply for Vetting](https://discord.com/channels/629113661113368594/693601096467218523/1349427482637635677)

10.title: üîü Build-A-VC Channel Names
10.text: Channel names must be clean and appropriate for Discord Discovery.
